Others: The 2024 Copa America will be the 48th edition of the Copa America, which is the international men's soccer championship organized by South America's football ruling body CONMEBOL. Every 4 years the countries from South America battle it out for regional supremacy. The tournament will be held in the US and is co-organized by CONCACAF. The US will host the tournament for the second time, and it will be held from June 20, 2024 to July 14, 2024. The winner will later compete in the 2025 UEFA Cup of Champions against the UEFA Euro 2024 winner.
